content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetBuckets path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/storage/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/buckets content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all buckets
responses
200
storagegetbucketsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
storagebucket
type obj
props
id
type str
desc the id for the bucket
label
type str
desc the name of the bucket
endpointurl
type str
desc the url used to access the bucket
storagebucketvisibility
type str
default private
desc private the bucket is private and only accessibly with credentials
  public the bucket is public and accessible over the internet
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date when the bucket was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date when the bucket was last updated
region
type str
desc the region in which the bucket is created available regions are useast1 uswest1 eucentral1
desc the requested buckets
desc the buckets for the given stack
title: 5_Buckets_GetBuckets_26.json
